description: Publishing online and in print November 2012, this landmark resource will offer the only comprehensive collection of twenty-first century scholarship available on the entire ancient Mediterranean world. Our board of experienced and internationally diverse editors has collected over 5,000 original entries spanning the late Bronze Age through the seventh century CE. Entries extend to all Mediterranean civilizations, including the Near East and Egypt, and represent an unprecedented level of coverage of the ancient world.
history: 2015-06-03T04:59:32.728850: Data automatically parsed from content of http://ancientworldonline.blogspot.com/2012/10/teasers-from-forthcoming-encyclopedia.html. (walk_to_json.py)
title: Teasers from the forthcoming The Encyclopedia of Ancient History
